subject: Thanks, you very much for your prompt response
body:
Dear Sir,

Thanks, you very much for your prompt response and also, I need private telephone number .

I am giving you an assurance to you that this transaction is 100% legitimate and it abides to international funds transfer regulations and please do not betray the trust I am placing on you.

I need your full co-operation in this transaction to ensure the successful completion of the transfer to your designated account.

NOTE: That it can either be the Private or Company account as every international modality would be strictly adhered to, in the completion of the remittance thereof. An application will be submitted on your behalf at the Department of Finance, requesting for the approval to transfer the fund according to the provisions and regulations of the foreign payment act of 2009.

As soon as the authorization approvals are issued by the Department of Finance, all the approval documentation will be made available to you as an evidence of the legitimacy of the fund, and pursuance of the financial administration code of conduct rules and the paying bank will have all the necessary powers to transfer the fund to the designated account overseas.

There will also be a certification verifying that the payment amount to you does not contravene the money laundering laws enacted in accordance with the International Monetary Fund (IMF) / South African standard practice, and that the money has no link to terrorism and other vices specified therein.

A direct communication channel will be opened between the paying bank here and your bank in your country or any other country, to intimate the properly about the purpose and reason of the remittance into the account provided.

This is to ascertain the origin and source of fund into the shores of the nation, and prevent any delay in the deposit of the transfer to the nominated account. At the conclusion of the fund deposit into your account, there will not be any question from your bank or financial regulatory agency in your country regarding the transaction, because every requirement would be met, and clearly followed.

Questions or suggestion are most warmly welcomed any time.

I wait your urgent response.
Thanks
Mr. Dan Zama

subject: Re: Thanks, you very much for your prompt response
body:
Hello Mr. Dan Zama,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the assurance of legitimacy and adherence to funds transfer regulations. It's comforting to know that all necessary precautions are being taken.

I'm curious about the process though, could you please elaborate on how the approvals are issued by the Department of Finance? Also, what kind of information will be made available to me as evidence of the legitimacy of the fund?

It's interesting that a direct channel will be opened between the paying bank here and my bank. How does this process work exactly? And how is it ensured that there won't be any delay in depositing the transfer into my nominated account?

I look forward to your answers and further understanding this process.

Best wishes,
Emily

subject: Details
body:
Dear Sir,

Thanks for your mail I assured you that is 100% free risk and the funds  , and this fund is over invoice contract funds and we have to get all the paperwork first before any transfer take place to your nominated bank account, but I will get all the paperwork done before any transfer. And also I need your telephone number.

So, provide your full banking details to enable me submit application of claim on your behalf. so, I need you to send the following information to me immediately to enable me submit an application of claim on your behalf.


The information I need are below:
Bank Name
bank Account Number
Beneficiary
Bank address
Bank Swift Code
     .

I wait for your swift response.
Regards,
Mr. Dan Zama

subject: Re: Thanks, you very much for your prompt response
body:
Hello Emily,

Compliments of the day and thank you very much for your emails that is well noted.

I really understand your curiosity over my proposal and I wish to give you all clarity on the procedures and procurement of all the required approval from both department of finance and transfer through the South African banking channel.

First let me explain to you, that the fund in question was as a result of an over-invoiced contract which has already been executed and fully paid by the department, right now we want to present you as the beneficiary to the over-invoiced amount of US$10.5M (Ten Million, five hundred thousand United States Dollars). The release and payment of this sum will be done with all the original contract information under your names as the beneficiary, the payment approvals will be issued by the department of finance with instructions to the Reserve bank of South Africa to effect release and transfer of funds to you.

Armed with these approvals and payment instructions, the Reserve bank will then process the funds transfer to your nominated account. You should note, that the original contract sum has already been approved and payment made to the original contractor.

The South African financial code of conduct regarding foreign contract payment, requires the full contract information and approvals from the department that awarded the contract and also from the finance department to facilitate the transfer of funds. Once these approvals are secured from both departments, the funds will be released and transferred to your nominated account.

Your nominated bank account details will be submitted to the Reserve bank of South Africa, to process the transfer of funds. There will not be any further delay in the fund transfer once these approvals are issued with a transfer instruction to the transferring bank. It is imperatively important that these required approvals are secured from both departments with the transfer authorization to the transferring bank to ensure that funds are transferred to your nominated account without any delays.

You will be furnished with all the original copies of these approvals once they are secured from these departments. The reason being that your bank will know the source of funds as a contract payment from South Africa, we will not like a situation whereby funds are confiscated immediately it hit your bank account. This is why all the necessary documentations are in place and transfer done through the legal channel, you should note that since the September 11 incident the American government ensures that every huge amount moving from one country to another is not money laundering or terrorist money.

I am well convinced that this email explains every step of this transaction and give you better perspective plus understanding.

Looking forward to working with you on this transaction as I await your prompt response, kindly note that machineries has been put in place for a smooth and safe transfer of funds to your nominated account without any problems.

Feel free to request for more explanation where necessary.
Regards,

Mr. Dan Zama.

Partner.

subject: Re: Details
body:
Hello Emily,

Compliments of the day and thank you for your email and contents well noted.

I have given you clarity on the source of this fund and also want to inform you that I am the director of contractor award and procurement in the department.

Like I stated in my previous mail, that this fund was as a result of contract awarded to foreign contractor. We have to claim this fund through legal way of contract payment by applying for the necessary approvals from the departments involved. The applications will be drafted under your names as the beneficiary to this fund with all the original contract information.

We will use the services of a lawyer to process all logistics and secure the necessary approvals that will facilitate the release and transfer of funds to your nominated account. This is the reason why your account is needed because the funds will be transferred through the South African banking channel.

The role of the Reserve bank in this transaction is, as the apex bank of the Republic of South Africa every contract payment by any government department, has to be done through the Reserve bank. It is the Department of Finance that issues release and payment authorization to the Reserve bank, to ensure that funds are transferred through the legal channels. So, without issuing these approvals the bank can not process any foreign transfers and funds will leave the shores of South Africa to any foreign bank account.

Lastly, your esteem contact information was as a result of my search through the South African centre for online business and people search.; I have already open up discussion with a lawyer that will assist us in processing all logistics and is now waiting for your details to facilitate the process.

I urge you to forward this detailed information and also a direct contact telephone number for easier communication and you can also reach me on this telephone number: +2773-7806903.

Looking forward to your prompt response.
Regards,

Mr. Dan Zama.

subject: Re: Details
body:
Dear Emily,

I understand your sceptics about giving out your accounting details but I will urge you to open up a new bank account purposely for this project. I know that it is such a sensitive information and will be difficult to share. You have to understand that a bank account is required to receive this fund and nothing else.
Regards,

Mr. Dan Zama.

subject: Re: Details
body:
Attn: Emilly.

I think I have virtually given all the explanation you need to know regarding this transaction and it is now up to you to make up your mind.

The lawyer is well known for such job of assisting clients to claim and receive their contract payment, he knows the pros and cons of such claims. I stated to you that you will receive copies of all the original documents once they are secured. It is the job of the attorney to process every document(s) and to ensure that the claim is submitted and the necessary approvals are issued by the departments involved. I can’t begin to tell you one by one every step to be taken rather, it is the lawyer that will handle the logistics aspect of this transaction and secure the necessary documents.


The lawyer is Mr. George Franklin and a reputable attorney known for handling this type of contract claims. He is well experienced and has been in this field for so long in assisting both local and foreign contractors.


In my last email, I stated that since you are in doubt over forwarding your banking coordinates, I suggest that open a new bank account just to receive this fund. Apart from your banking details the other details required are just your direct telephone number, forwarding address and your type of business. You can go to your local bank and open any type of account which can be able to receive the fund.

Kindly note that the lawyer is supposed to have submitted the claims applications by now.
Regards,

Mr. Dan Zama.

Tel: +2773-7806903.

subject: Re: Details
body:
Hello Mr. Dan Zama,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's really helpful to understand the process better. I'm glad to hear that Mr. George Franklin is a reputable attorney with experience in this field.

I have a few follow-up questions, if you don't mind. Could you please tell me more about the type of documents that will be secured by the lawyer? And what kind of approvals are usually needed for such claims?

Also, regarding the new bank account, could you please clarify why it would be necessary? Would it be possible to use an existing account instead?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Emily

subject: Re: Details
body:
Hello Emily,

Compliments of the day and thank you once again for your mail.

I have explained to you everything regarding this transaction, the reason why a bank account is required is because the fund has to transferred through the South African bank. It is a contract payment and a huge amount of money that requires clearance so that when your account is credited to the tune of the amount your government will not seize the fund.

The type of documents are contract documents that will facilitate safety of funds in your account without any queries from the government authority. Since the September 1 incident, the American government ensures that huge amount of money transferred around the globe has nothing to do with money laundering and Terrorist activities.

The reason why I asked you for a new bank account was because you made mention of fear of sharing your banking information. If you have the existing bank account, it is fine and can be used to receive the funds.

Kindly note that every clarity has been given to you and if you indeed want us to commence this transaction, you have to forward the required information immediately so that the lawyer can submit the necessary application.

I requested your direct telephone number so that some of this question can be sorted over the telephone.
Regards,

Mr. Dan Zama.

Tel: +2773-7806903.
